Note: Stanzas 1-3 are a variant of 3939, stanzas 1, 2, 5; stanzas 4-6 are a variant of 4060, stanzas 2, 3, 8; ‘b’ line of stanza always rhymes with burden.
Subjects: hymns, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: James Ryman, A hymn to the Virgin Mary — six quatrains (abab) and burden: ‘O regina clemencie / O mater indulgencie’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O Iesse yerde florigeratThe fruyte of liffe is sprunge of
                    þe…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…In the sweete blisse of paradyceWherof endyng never shall
                    be
